overview: Screwing a ballpoint pen together is no match! No, not one! But screw up 5000 if da'n, 25000 a week, 110000 a month or 1210000 a year! You may be able to do it for five years-possibly 10-then you have chronic, lifelong aches and can no longer wash your Windows or lift your children. You have invested yourself-like hundreds of thousands of other Swedish industrial workers. From the factory Ballograf BIC in Gothenburg.
title: Satsa dig själv
